From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 Indian Hindi-language crime film


Am I NextOfficial release posterDirected byRahat Kazmi[1]Written byScreenplay:Kritika RampalRahat KazmiDialogue:Shalini BhedeRahat KazmiStory byKritika RampalProduced byRahat KazmiTariq KhanZeba SajidStarring
Anushka Sen
Neelu Dogra
Pooja Dargan
Tariq Khan
Ahmer Haider
CinematographyLuxmi ChandEdited byRahat KazmiMusic byTuhin K BiswasProductioncompanies
Rahat Kazmi Film Studios
Loop Pool Films and Piku Art's (Singapore)
Distributed byZEE5[2]Release date
17 March 2023 (2023-03-17)
Running time85 minutes[3]CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Am I Next is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language crime film directed and produced by Rahhat Kazmi[4] under the banner of Rahat Kazmi Film Studios, along with Loop Pool Films and Piku Art's (Singapore). It features Anushka Sen, Neelu Dogra, Pooja Dargan, Tariq Khan, Ahmer Haider. It was digitally released on ZEE5 on 17 March 2023.[5]


Plot[edit]
A sudden shock grabs the family of 14–year old Honey, when they get to know their teenage daughter is pregnant. She was raped and now there is a long court battle to seek her right to terminate the pregnancy.

Cast[edit]
Anushka Sen as Honey
Neelu Dogra as Rammi, Honey's mother
Pankaj Khajuria as Ramandeep, Honey's father
Rajeev Rana as Gopal Das, Aman's father
Pooja Dargan as Lawyer Naina
Swaroopa Ghosh as Vaibhavi Sachdeva
Tariq Khan as Sukhchain Singh, Inspector
Ahmer Haider as Dr. Rahul
Satish Bhat as Aman[6]
Monica Aggarwal as Monica Sharma (High court judge)
Mir Sarwar as Lower court judge
Kusum Tikko as Principal[7]
Release[edit]
The film was digitally premiered on ZEE5 on 17 March 2023. As a result, it reached audiences in 190+ countries.[8]

Reception[edit]
The film received positive reviews from critics as well as it is highly acclaimed movie on teenage rape.[9] The Times of India rated 3 out of 5 stars and praised performances and screenplay.[3] The Director of the film Rahat Kazmi said: "This film is extremely special to me because of the powerful story that we have. With a lot of research, we managed to make a film that will connect with the audience."[10]

Soundtrack[edit]
Am I NextSoundtrack album by Tuhin K Biswas, Rohit Bhatia, Adif Altaf, Sukhamrit-SachinReleasedMarch 2023[11]GenreFeature film soundtrackLength14:59[12]LanguageHindiLabelPanorama MusicExternal audio Am I Next Soundtrack
The soundtrack is composed, arranged and produced by Tuhin K Biswas, Rohit Bhatia, Adif Altaf, Sukhamrit-Sachin.
